name: Boozehound
description:
An experimental horror game about a man living in a cabin in the mountains

This game was raised from the dead and created in quite a rush for an improvement game jam and there are probably plenty of bugs that are unforeseen by us!

There were a lot of things we wanted to add and a lot of things we had to cut from the game in order to meet the deadline, this game is by no means a polished one! be warned!

Controls : 

  • WASD movement
  • Q to drop items
  • LMB to inspect items
  • E to interact or pickup items
